item.title: Sleepaway camp offers homeless kids a place to belong
item.description: Camp Homeward Bound is a summer sleepaway camp designed specifically for children who come from New York City homeless and domestic violence shelters.

item.title: Former Joint Task Force Katrina commander Russel Honoré remembers leading response to storm
item.description: Retired Lt. General Russel Honoré led the military response to Hurricane Katrina in 2005. He joined CBS News to talk about the storm, nearly 20 years ...

item.title: 5 journalists among those killed in Israeli strike on Gaza hospital
item.description: Health officials in Gaza say an Israeli strike on Nasser Hospital has killed at least 20 people, including 5 journalists.
